entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
